heroSubtitle1: A space of deep healing, care and transformation with ancestral medicines.
heroSubtitle2: Discover how Ayahuasca can illuminate your path to self-knowledge and inner peace.
upcomingCeremoniesSubtitle: Reserve your space and start your transformation journey. Limited spots available.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to the ceremony details here.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the experienced spiritual guides who will accompany you on your journey.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This will permanently remove the guide's profile.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred psychoactive brew originating from the Amazon. It is composed of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of the Chacruna plant (Psychotria viridis). For centuries, indigenous cultures have used it in ceremonial contexts for healing, divination, and spiritual connection.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The combination of plants allows the psychoactive component, DMT (from Chacruna), to be active when ingested orally. This induces altered states of consciousness, often characterized by introspection, deep emotional release, and profound spiritual insights. The experience is guided by the spirit of the plant, which is considered a master teacher.
spiritualMasterDescription: We approach Ayahuasca with deep respect, viewing it not as a substance, but as a wise and ancient teacher. It guides us to confront our shadows, heal emotional wounds, and connect with the essence of our being. Each ceremony is a dialogue with this sacred intelligence.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many find answers to deep-seated questions about their life's purpose, relationships, and personal path.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: The experience can facilitate the release of trauma, anxiety, depression, and limiting belief patterns.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Participants often report a profound sense of connection to nature, the universe, and their own spirituality.
groupCeremonyDescription: Held in a safe and supportive group setting, where the collective energy enhances the individual healing process. It's an opportunity to share and connect with others on a similar path.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate, one-on-one session tailored specifically to your personal healing journey. This allows for a deeper and more focused dive into your intentions with the guide's undivided attention.
preparationProcessDescription: The journey begins before the ceremony. We guide you through diet and intention setting.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred space where you connect with the medicine under expert guidance.
experienceProcessDescription: A profound journey inward to receive insights, healing, and clarity.
integrationProcessDescription: We help you understand and apply the lessons from your experience into daily life.
dietSubtitle: To purify the body and spirit, we recommend following this diet for at least one week before the ceremony.
allowedFoodsList: Whole grains like quinoa, rice, and oats.
Legumes such as lentils and beans.
Lean proteins like fish or chicken (if not vegetarian).
Plenty of water and herbal teas.
prohibitedFoodsList: Sexual activity is also recommended to be avoided.
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your mindset is key to a transformative experience. Dedicate time to these practices.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and open your heart.
intentionsDescription: Clearly define what you seek: healing, clarity, connection? Write it down.
reflectionDescription: Reflect on your life and the patterns you wish to understand or change.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca can bring suppressed emotions to the surface for release and healing. Be open and willing to feel. It is a process of purification. Trust the medicine and the guides; you are in a safe space to explore and let go.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare for a comfortable and profound night.
comfortItemsList: Comfortable, loose-fitting clothing (preferably in light colors).
A warm blanket and a pillow.
A notebook and pen for integration.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is the first step towards a meaningful and transformative experience. Our guide is here to help you.
contactCommunityText: Join our community and follow us on our social networks to stay updated on our next ceremonies and events.
addVideoDescription: Add a new video to the past ceremonies carousel.
videoFormUrlOrUpload: A video URL or file upload is required.
deleteVideoConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this video from the carousel.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content and settings.
themeTabDescription: Customize the application's color scheme (dark mode). HSL format: hue saturation% lightness%
allConversationsDescription: Click on a conversation to view the messages.
noConversationsFound: No conversations have been started yet.
userManagementSubtitle: View and manage all registered users.
allUsersDescription: Here you can manage user roles and view their information.
whatsappInviteMessage: Hello! We invite you to complete our health questionnaire to prepare for your ceremony at El Arte de Sanar. Please follow this link:
sendEmailDescription: Send an email to all registered users.
errorRequiredDetails: Please provide details if you answered 'Yes'.
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your questionnaire has been saved successfully.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was an error saving your questionnaire. Please try again.
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please answer these questions honestly. This information is confidential and will only be used to ensure a safe experience for you.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (e.g., heart problems, high blood pressure, epilepsy)?
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication (including antidepressants, anxiolytics, or supplements)?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list all medications and supplements you are taking.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a personal or family history of mental health conditions (e.g., schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)?
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Please detail your personal or family mental health history.
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with ayahuasca or other psychoactive substances?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: Please briefly describe your previous experiences.
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you hope to achieve, heal, or understand...
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: This is the information provided by the user.
noAnswersSubmitted: This user has not submitted their questionnaire yet.
tourStepPastCeremonies: Here you can see videos from our past ceremonies. You can use the arrows to navigate.
tourStepUpcomingCeremonies: These are our next scheduled ceremonies. Click 'View Prices' to see the details.
tourStepFinal: Great! Now, let's fill out a brief health questionnaire to ensure your safety during the ceremony.
tourWelcomeDescription: Let's take a quick tour of the site before you fill out the health questionnaire.
tourPhoneNumberLabel: First, could you provide us with your WhatsApp number?
tourPhoneNumberDescription: We will only use it to coordinate details about the ceremony.
promptRegisterDescription: Register to receive updates on our ceremonies, access exclusive content, and fill out your health questionnaire.
chatbotWelcome: Greetings, I am the Spiritual Guide. How may I assist you on your path to healing today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
editHeroVideoDescription: Change the main video of the hero section by providing a URL or uploading a new file.
errorSelectVideoOrUrl: Please select a video file or enter a URL.
defaultContributionText: You can reserve with a 20% down payment.
